GSP33madhanuu:720: sā bhaved yatra sa vyarthaḥ pūrvāroho bhramo yathā /

GSP33madhanuu:748: na cetanavikāraḥ syād yatra kvāpi hyacetanam /

GSP33madhanuu:755: yo bhāgo na vikārī syāt sa evāsmākamīśvaraḥ // MAnuv_1,4.69 //
GSP33madhanuu:756: bhinnānāṃ samudāyasya nāma brahmeti ced bhavet /

GSP33madhanuu:763: na cācetanatas tatra cetanasya samudbhavaḥ // MAnuv_1,4.73 //

GSP33madhanuu:792: sa hi karteti vākyācca jāgrattvamiti hi bhramaḥ // MAnuv_1,4.87 //
GSP33madhanuu:795: brahma tvarthakriyākāri parataḥ svata eva vā /

GSP33madhanuu:798: na hi sampratipattiḥ syādatastiṣṭhatu sā pramā // MAnuv_1,4.90 //
GSP33madhanuu:799: na hi vipratipannena śakyaṃ sādhayituṃ kvacit /

GSP33madhanuu:807: sākṣisiddhasya na kvāpi bādhyatvaṃ tadadoṣataḥ // MAnuv_1,4.94 //

GSP33madhanuu:812: tadetaditi sarvaṃ ca dṛśyaṃ vā smṛtigocaram /
GSP33madhanuu:813: sākṣisiddhena kālena khacitaṃ hyeva vartate // MAnuv_1,4.97 //
GSP33madhanuu:814: tasmānna taṃ vinā kiñcit smartuṃ draṣṭumathāpi vā /
GSP33madhanuu:817: parīkṣādeśca satyatvaṃ tena hyeva mataṃ bhavet // MAnuv_1,4.99 //
GSP33madhanuu:819: akasmād vinivṛttiśca kiṃ viśvasya na śaṅkayate // MAnuv_1,4.100 //
GSP33madhanuu:820: itaḥ pūrvaṃ tathābhāvād yadi no saṃsṛtergatiḥ /

GSP33madhanuu:829: paro nāstīti vadati kimityunmattavad vadet // MAnuv_1,4.105 //
GSP33madhanuu:830: parābhāve hi vāg vyarthā yadi naivocyate tadā /
GSP33madhanuu:832: prapañco yadi vidyeta nivarteta na saṃśayaḥ /
GSP33madhanuu:835: upadeśādayaṃ vādo 'jñāte dvaitaṃ na vidyate // MAnuv_1,4.108 //
GSP33madhanuu:836: ityatra yadiśabdau ca nivarteteti ca dvayam /
GSP33madhanuu:842: mithaśca jaḍabhedo yaḥ prapañco bhedapañcakaḥ // MAnuv_1,4.111 //
GSP33madhanuu:844: dvaitaṃ na vidyata iti tasmādajñānināṃ matam // MAnuv_1,4.112 //
GSP33madhanuu:847: vācārabdhaṃ tu sāṅketyaṃ nāma syād vikṛtaṃ bahu /

GSP33madhanuu:855: etat satyaṃ brahmapuramiti nityatva eva hi /

GSP33madhanuu:860: sarvakārṣṇāyasaṃ ca syādataḥ sādṛśya eva ca // MAnuv_1,4.120 //
GSP33madhanuu:863: tasmāt kenāpi mārgeṇa na vivartamataṃ bhavet /

GSP33madhanuu:872: pādāḥ sarve tadaṃśāśca mūrtīnāṃ varṇamā'gamāt // MAnuv_2,1.2 //
GSP33madhanuu:876: etā eva tvatibalā siddhāntasya niyāmakāḥ // MAnuv_2,1.4 //
GSP33madhanuu:877: āptaiḥ pratyakṣato dṛṣṭvā proktamarthaṃ kathaṃ śratiḥ /

GSP33madhanuu:880: kiṃ nāśeṣavido mānaṃ hy ubhayatra samaṃ bhavet // MAnuv_2,1.6 //

GSP33madhanuu:884: niyamo vyabhicāro vā naiva jñātuṃ hi śakyate // MAnuv_2,1.8 //
GSP33madhanuu:886: vedokto hy adhikārastu durlabhaḥ sarvamānuṣaiḥ // MAnuv_2,1.9 //
GSP33madhanuu:891: ucyate 'tastaduktaṃ hi vyabhicāri phale 'pi tu // MAnuv_2,1.11 //
GSP33madhanuu:893: ujkhitaṃ sarvadoṣaiśca kathaṃ no mānatāṃ vrajet // MAnuv_2,1.12 //
GSP33madhanuu:900: tanmūlatvāt smṛtīnāṃ ca virodho yatra na kvacit /

GSP33madhanuu:907: syāt tatra yukta evārtho yuktiśca trividhā matā // MAnuv_2,1.19 //
GSP33madhanuu:911: arthatvamaryataiva syānna kriyārtheṣu sā matā // MAnuv_2,1.21 //
GSP33madhanuu:917: aṅgīkṛtaṃ cet prāmāṇyaṃ smṛtyādeḥ kā virodhatā // MAnuv_2,1.24 //
GSP33madhanuu:919: phalavattvaṃ nacāsmābhiḥ prāmāṇyaṃ hi vivakṣitam // MAnuv_2,1.25 //
GSP33madhanuu:921: sukhaduḥkhādikaṃ kiñcit smṛtāvapi hi dṛśyate // MAnuv_2,1.26 //
GSP33madhanuu:930: anumā yuktirevoktā vyāptireva tu sā smṛtā /

GSP33madhanuu:936: dṛṣṭāntādiṣu caivaṃ syāt sādhanaṃ punareva hi /
GSP33madhanuu:945: saṃvādānuktisaṃyuktā eta eva ca nigrahāḥ // MAnuv_2,1.38 //
GSP33madhanuu:949: satāmeva kathā jñeyā vitaṇḍā tvasatāṃ satām // MAnuv_2,1.40 //
GSP33madhanuu:951: ukte taiḥ prathamaṃ māne vaktavyaṃ tasya dūṣaṇam // MAnuv_2,1.41 //
GSP33madhanuu:954: vinaiva tattvanirṇītiṃ na hi jalpādinā kvacit /

GSP33madhanuu:964: jalpa ityapi nāma syād vādasyaitādṛśasya tu /

GSP33madhanuu:1001: vyutpattiḥ sā balavatī mūrkhavyutpattitā hi yat // MAnuv_2,1.66 //
GSP33madhanuu:1007: kathaṃ na nirṇayaṃ kuryādityasat kāraṇaṃ na hi // MAnuv_2,1.69 //

GSP33madhanuu:1010: asat kāryaṃ yathā dṛṣṭaṃ vastutvāt kāraṇaṃ tathā /

GSP33madhanuu:1015: abhāvasya ca bhāvo 'pi dharmo 'thāpi hi dharmiṇaḥ /

GSP33madhanuu:1025: adṛṣṭaṃ kāraṇaṃ no cellaye mānaṃ ca kiṃ bhavet /

GSP33madhanuu:1031: anyathāsyāpratiṣṭhā ca svavācā vyāhataiva hi // MAnuv_2,1.80 //

GSP33madhanuu:1037: prāpakaṃ vākyamātraṃ tu parihāro viśeṣitaḥ // MAnuv_2,1.83 //
GSP33madhanuu:1041: ato jīvasya na brahmabhāvaḥ syāddhi kadācana // MAnuv_2,1.85 //
GSP33madhanuu:1043: dṛśyenno dṛṣṭapūrvaṃ hi tādṛśaṃ na ca dṛśyate // MAnuv_2,1.86 //
GSP33madhanuu:1044: bhoktṛtvāpattita iti yanmataṃ tat kuto hariḥ /

GSP33madhanuu:1048: dravyaṃ karma ca kālaśca svabhāvaścetanā dhṛtiḥ /
GSP33madhanuu:1050: iti śrutestadvaśasya bhāvo na para ityataḥ // MAnuv_2,1.89 //
GSP33madhanuu:1054: asad yat kāryarūpeṇa kāraṇātmatayāsti hi // MAnuv_2,1.91 //
GSP33madhanuu:1060: kāryeṣu yaḥ karotyaddhā namastasmai svayambhuve // MAnuv_2,1.94 //
GSP33madhanuu:1061: yadi bhāgena kāryeṣu jīvaśaktiṃ na yojayet /
GSP33madhanuu:1062: haristadā hi sarvatra kṛtsnayatnoṃ'śitāpi vā // MAnuv_2,1.95 //
GSP33madhanuu:1063: aṃśino hi paṭādyā ye bhinnaireva parasparam /
GSP33madhanuu:1064: aṃśairaṃśina ucyante naivameva hi cetanāḥ // MAnuv_2,1.96 //
GSP33madhanuu:1070: tasya tvaśeṣaśaktitvād yujyate savarmeva ca // MAnuv_2,1.99 //
GSP33madhanuu:1080: iti kevalalīlaiva nirṇītā prabhuṇā svayam // MAnuv_2,1.104 //
GSP33madhanuu:1086: mokṣārthāḥ śrutayo yasmāt sa ca tasya prasādataḥ /
GSP33madhanuu:1094: yadadhīnā guṇāścaiva doṣā api hi sarvaśaḥ /
GSP33madhanuu:1095: guṇāstasya kathaṃ na syuḥ syurdeṣāśca kathaṃ punaḥ // MAnuv_2,1.111 //
GSP33madhanuu:1100: evaṃ caturvidhā naiva viruddhayante 'nvayaṃ prati // MAnuv_2,2.1 //
GSP33madhanuu:1109: vidveṣāt parame tattve tattvavediṣu cāniśam // MAnuv_2,2.5 //
GSP33madhanuu:1118: cetanaṃ tadasaṅkhayātaṃ bhinnamanyad layaṃ bhavet // MAnuv_2,2.9 //
GSP33madhanuu:1129: na ca kācit pramoktārthe śrutireva pramā hi naḥ /

GSP33madhanuu:1134: ityeva pratiṣiddhasya kena mūlānumā bhavet // MAnuv_2,2.17 //
GSP33madhanuu:1138: kuta icchācetanasya secchaṃ cet kimacetanam // MAnuv_2,2.19 //
GSP33madhanuu:1141: kathaṃ na sa ghaṭasya syānmano ma iti bhedataḥ /

GSP33madhanuu:1146: acetanaṃ jagatkartṛ payo 'mbvādi ca nopamā // MAnuv_2,2.23 //
GSP33madhanuu:1156: mokṣakāmasya kiṃ tena svanāśārthaṃ ca ko yatet // MAnuv_2,2.28 //
GSP33madhanuu:1158: vibhāge ca tayormānaṃ naiva kiñcit kvacid bhavet // MAnuv_2,2.29 //
GSP33madhanuu:1167: anyatra kāpi śaktirna svātantryeṇeśa eva hi /

GSP33madhanuu:1172: niyāmayati nityaṃ ca na ṛte tvaditi śruteḥ // MAnuv_2,2.36 //
GSP33madhanuu:1174: yatprasādādime santi na santi yadupekṣayā // MAnuv_2,2.37 //
GSP33madhanuu:1175: iti śruterna sattādyā api nārāyaṇaṃ vinā /
GSP33madhanuu:1178: deha ātmā pumarthaśca kāmārthābhyāṃ vinā na hi // MAnuv_2,2.39 //
GSP33madhanuu:1180: labdhastenaiva hi naraiḥ śāstrāt kiṃ mohanaṃ vinā // MAnuv_2,2.40 //
GSP33madhanuu:1184: mama deha iti vyaktaṃ mamārtha itivat sadā // MAnuv_2,2.42 //
GSP33madhanuu:1186: yadi tatsādhakaṃ vedaprāmāṇye na kathaṃ bhavet // MAnuv_2,2.43 //
GSP33madhanuu:1200: nāṅgīkurvanti ye teṣāṃ sarveṣāṃ ca samā ime // MAnuv_2,2.49 //
GSP33madhanuu:1213: nityaṃ kriyā anityāstu guṇadravye dvirūpake // MAnuv_2,2.55 //
GSP33madhanuu:1217: dvayaṇuke paramāṇau ca hrasvatvaṃ parimaṇḍalam // MAnuv_2,2.57 //
GSP33madhanuu:1218: na kāraṇaṃ kāryaguṇe vairūpyaṃ tatra kāraṇam /

GSP33madhanuu:1225: sadṛśasya hi kāryasya naiva yogaḥ kathañcana // MAnuv_2,2.61 //
GSP33madhanuu:1230: aṇutvaṃ ca mahattvaṃ ca yato vastuvyapekṣayā // MAnuv_2,2.63 //
GSP33madhanuu:1231: tāratamyasthitā yasmāt padārthāḥ sarva eva ca /
GSP33madhanuu:1241: yadi no sākṣigamyaṃ tanmahattvaṃ kena gamyate /
GSP33madhanuu:1251: yāti naiva guṇālpatvaṃ kālātpatvaṃ ca mānagam /
GSP33madhanuu:1253: mahāguṇasya cālpo 'pi guṇaḥ syāditi ced bhavet /
GSP33madhanuu:1254: tāvattvameva naiva syād deśe 'pyetanna no matam // MAnuv_2,2.75 //
GSP33madhanuu:1256: yadyalpadeśasaṃsthānaṃ na sarvatrāpi no bhavet // MAnuv_2,2.76 //
GSP33madhanuu:1259: śūnyatvameva tasya syād yasyaikatrāpi na sthitiḥ /
GSP33madhanuu:1260: ato nāṇutvaviśrāntirna mahattvasya ca kvacit // MAnuv_2,2.78 //
GSP33madhanuu:1262: tacca brahma paraṃ sākṣāt sarvānantyayutaṃ sadā // MAnuv_2,2.79 //
GSP33madhanuu:1263: yadi sākṣī svayambhāto na mānaṃ kena gamyate /
GSP33madhanuu:1268: dvayoreva tu saṃyoga iti kenāvasīyate // MAnuv_2,2.82 //
GSP33madhanuu:1271: na ca tatproktasṛṣṭau tu mānaṃ kevalakalpanā /
GSP33madhanuu:1272: kathaṃ sākṣimitasyāsya śaknuyād vāraṇe kvacit // MAnuv_2,2.84 //
GSP33madhanuu:1277: sadṛśaṃ ca sajātīyaṃ nāsmatpakṣe kim eva hi /
GSP33madhanuu:1284: tannirdhāritayuktirvā vyāptiḥ saivāparā na hi // MAnuv_2,2.89 //
GSP33madhanuu:1286: aniṣṭāni ca sarvāṇi hyanumā kāmacāriṇī // MAnuv_2,2.90 //
GSP33madhanuu:1288: bhinnasyaiva tu sambandhaḥ samavāyo 'nya īryate // MAnuv_2,2.91 //
GSP33madhanuu:1290: sa svanirvāhakaścet syād dravyameva tathā na kim // MAnuv_2,2.92 //
GSP33madhanuu:1298: ekasmin sa viśeṣaścet kiṃ pūrvaṃ tasya vismṛtiḥ // MAnuv_2,2.96 //
GSP33madhanuu:1300: bhāvābhāvavibhāgena yaṃ vinā na kathañcana // MAnuv_2,2.97 //
GSP33madhanuu:1304: kathaṃ dharmā nivāryante vastvaikye 'pi hi vādibhiḥ // MAnuv_2,2.99 //
GSP33madhanuu:1306: kathaṃ viśeṣo naivāsti sa ca dharmo 'paro yadi // MAnuv_2,2.100 //
GSP33madhanuu:1310: nāṅgīkṛtaḥ sa ca yadi nānavasthā kvacid bhavet // MAnuv_2,2.102 //
GSP33madhanuu:1312: ananyatvānnānavasthā bhedo nāśe bhavet tathā // MAnuv_2,2.103 //
GSP33madhanuu:1316: tato dṛṣṭe virodhastu sadbhirāpādyate katham // MAnuv_2,2.105 //
GSP33madhanuu:1320: bhāve ta eva cocchedāt tadanye ca samastaśaḥ // MAnuv_2,2.107 //
GSP33madhanuu:1323: ekasmin jāta evānyaḥ saṃyogo jāyate yadi /
GSP33madhanuu:1324: anavasthā tadaiva syāt saṃyogaikye bhavet kva sā // MAnuv_2,2.109 //
GSP33madhanuu:1326: yadyaṃśago na saṃyogaḥ kāryeṣu prathimā katham // MAnuv_2,2.110 //
GSP33madhanuu:1329: paramāṇormahattvaṃ ca vinetyetad vacaḥ katham // MAnuv_2,2.111 //
GSP33madhanuu:1334: bhinnā iti tu bhedānāṃ samudāyo hi dṛśyate /
GSP33madhanuu:1337: tatraikavacanaṃ yattad viprāṇāṃ bhojanaṃ yathā // MAnuv_2,2.115 //
GSP33madhanuu:1339: na sarvadharma eko 'sti samudāyastu bhinnagaḥ // MAnuv_2,2.116 //
GSP33madhanuu:1340: etādṛśaṃ ca sādṛśyaṃ padārtheṣu pṛthak pṛthak /
GSP33madhanuu:1341: ekasmin sa vinaṣṭe 'pi yato 'nyatraiva dṛśyate // MAnuv_2,2.117 //
GSP33madhanuu:1343: ekatve nāsti mānaṃ ca śrutirapyāha sādaram // MAnuv_2,2.118 //
GSP33madhanuu:1352: tādṛśo 'yaṃ ca tacchabda iti jñāpayati sphuṭam /
GSP33madhanuu:1353: jātitaścet kathaṃ tāsu tatra cedanavasthitiḥ // MAnuv_2,2.123 //
GSP33madhanuu:1360: anyat tadeva cedagnimattvaṃ kiṃ tatra bhaṇyate // MAnuv_2,2.126 //
GSP33madhanuu:1362: bhūdharasyāgnisaṃyogo yadi ṣaṣṭhayartha eva kaḥ // MAnuv_2,2.127 //
GSP33madhanuu:1363: samavāyo yadi hy asya caikatvāt siddhasādhanam /
GSP33madhanuu:1366: satyatvāt ko viśeṣaḥ syānmāyāvādyanyathā bhavet // MAnuv_2,2.129 //
GSP33madhanuu:1369: bhinnatvaṃ caiva teṣvasti ko viśeṣa upādhige // MAnuv_2,2.130 //
GSP33madhanuu:1371: upādhinā tadgamakamanumānaṃ na mā bhavet // MAnuv_2,2.131 //
GSP33madhanuu:1375: nāsti doṣaḥ kvacid bhāvo hyabhāvaśca sa eva hi // MAnuv_2,2.133 //
GSP33madhanuu:1376: abhāvasya ca dharmāḥ syurbhāvāsteṣāṃ ca te 'khilāḥ /
GSP33madhanuu:1378: sarve bhāvā abhāvāśca padārthāstena sarvadā // MAnuv_2,2.134 //
GSP33madhanuu:1380: so 'bhāvo vidhibuddhestu gocaraḥ prathamaṃ paraḥ // MAnuv_2,2.135 //
GSP33madhanuu:1382: astyabhāvo 'sti ca dhvaṃso dehābhāvaśca bhasmatā // MAnuv_2,2.136 //
GSP33madhanuu:1384: anyonyābhāvabhedau ca pṛthaktavaṃ ca pṛthak pṛthak // MAnuv_2,2.137 //
GSP33madhanuu:1386: paryāyatvena te śabdā jñāyante sarva eva hi // MAnuv_2,2.138 //
GSP33madhanuu:1387: bhedasya tu svarūpatve ye vadanti ca śūnyatām /
GSP33madhanuu:1389: pratiyogino hi bhedo 'yaṃ natu svasmāt kathañcana /
GSP33madhanuu:1390: vibhāgenālpataiva syāt kuta eva ca śūnyatā // MAnuv_2,2.140 //
GSP33madhanuu:1391: na śūnyānāṃ hi saṃyogād bhāvo vastuna iṣyate /
GSP33madhanuu:1393: avidāraṇe 'pi hyāsyasya bhinnāvoṣṭhau tu tasya ca /
GSP33madhanuu:1406: kathaṃ sarvajñatā tasya svajñānādhigamaṃ vinā // MAnuv_2,2.148 //
GSP33madhanuu:1413: sukhavān duḥkhavāṃśca syāditi vyāptiśca no bhavet /
GSP33madhanuu:1416: ānandaṃ brahmaṇo vidvān vipāpmetyādikā ca sā // MAnuv_2,2.153 //
GSP33madhanuu:1421: yajñāder api pāpasya hetutvaṃ hiṃsayā yuteḥ /
GSP33madhanuu:1424: aduḥkhamitarat sarvaṃ jīvā eva tu duḥkhinaḥ /
GSP33madhanuu:1426: iti śrutirhi paramā śrutyuktir yadi kāraṇam /
GSP33madhanuu:1429: pūrvoktena prakāreṇa neśvaro dharma eva ca /
GSP33madhanuu:1430: syāt tatphalaṃ ca tenātra śrutireva pramā bhavet // MAnuv_2,2.159 //
GSP33madhanuu:1432: tayā sarvaguṇaiḥ pūrṇa ukta īśo yatastataḥ // MAnuv_2,2.160 //
GSP33madhanuu:1436: adṛṣṭakālayoścaiva bhāvāt kāryaṃ sadā bhavet // MAnuv_2,2.162 //
GSP33madhanuu:1440: sarve nimeṣā iti hi śrutirevāha sādaram // MAnuv_2,2.164 //
GSP33madhanuu:1442: kālasya kālagatvena na virodho 'pi kaścana // MAnuv_2,2.165 //
GSP33madhanuu:1444: īśo deśaś ca kālaś ca svagatā eva sarvadā // MAnuv_2,2.166 //
GSP33madhanuu:1445: īśādhīnau ca tau nityaṃ tadādhārau ca tadgatau /
GSP33madhanuu:1446: iti śrutirapi prāha kāle svoddiṣṭa eva tu // MAnuv_2,2.167 //
GSP33madhanuu:1448: syāt kālaḥ sa tadaiveti kālasya svagatatvataḥ // MAnuv_2,2.168 //
GSP33madhanuu:1461: mokṣaṃ sa samudāyo hi naikasmādeva yujyate /
GSP33madhanuu:1475: kāryaṃ ca kāraṇaṃ caiva yatkiñcid yasya kasyacit // MAnuv_2,2.181 //
GSP33madhanuu:1477: iti nityavināśitve kena mānena gamyate // MAnuv_2,2.182 //
GSP33madhanuu:1486: yadyākāśasya sattvaṃ na kuta eva narādiṣu /
GSP33madhanuu:1488: tau vinā na hy abhāvaś ca kvaciddṛṣṭaḥ kadācana /
GSP33madhanuu:1493: na saṃskārārpakatvaṃ ca yujyate kasyacit kvacit // MAnuv_2,2.189 //
GSP33madhanuu:1494: ato jñātaṃ mayetyādi na jñeyamanumā kutaḥ /
GSP33madhanuu:1496: kuta ātmādikeṣu syād balyevānubhavo yataḥ // MAnuv_2,2.190 //
GSP33madhanuu:1500: asambaddhaḥ kathaṃ pūrva uttare vāsanākaraḥ // MAnuv_2,2.192 //
GSP33madhanuu:1506: vināśe cenna tatkāryaṃ kāryotpattau ca kā pramā // MAnuv_2,2.195 //
GSP33madhanuu:1509: viśeṣadarśanaṃ mānaṃ yadi na sthairyadṛk kutaḥ /
GSP33madhanuu:1510: diksukhe ca khadṛṣṭāntād bhāvau saccet kvacid bhaved // MAnuv_2,2.197 //
GSP33madhanuu:1514: kathaṃ nu tasya buddhitvaṃ viśvamanyacca kimpramam // MAnuv_2,2.199 //
GSP33madhanuu:1517: so 'haṃ tadidamevāhaṃ sukhī sad gaganaṃ diśaḥ /
GSP33madhanuu:1520: durmataṃ ko nu gṛhṇīyād vināsuratatiṃ kvacit // MAnuv_2,2.202 //
GSP33madhanuu:1527: sadivābhāti satyatvaṃ sāṃvṛtaṃ tasya ceṣyate // MAnuv_2,2.205 //
GSP33madhanuu:1532: iti brūte tamuddiśya jagāda jagatāṃ guruḥ // MAnuv_2,2.207 //
GSP33madhanuu:1533: nāsato jagato bhāvo na hi dṛṣṭāsato janiḥ /
GSP33madhanuu:1534: sataḥ kvacit pramāṇaṃ ca dṛṣṭirevākhilād varam // MAnuv_2,2.208 //
GSP33madhanuu:1541: kiṃ nānumīyate tadvad vastutvāt puruṣād bhavaḥ /
GSP33madhanuu:1542: sarvasyāpi nacābhāvo viśvaṃ saditi gamyate // MAnuv_2,2.212 //
GSP33madhanuu:1545: yadi sattvena kiñcātra bhramo naiva nivartate /
GSP33madhanuu:1548: dṛṣṭasya bhrāntitā cet syādadṛṣṭe na bhramaḥ kutaḥ /
GSP33madhanuu:1552: dṛśyatvād vimaṃta mithyā svapnavaccediyaṃ ca mā /
GSP33madhanuu:1553: mithyā cet sādhyasiddhirna vyabhicāro na ced bhavet // MAnuv_2,2.217 //
GSP33madhanuu:1555: tasya cetyanavasthā syāt sattvaṃ cāsyānubhūtitaḥ // MAnuv_2,2.218 //
GSP33madhanuu:1561: tenāpyaṅgīkṛtaḥ samyak sa naḥ satyatvameva hi // MAnuv_2,2.220 //
GSP33madhanuu:1563: naiva dṛṣṭā pramā sā ca na bhavet svavirodhataḥ // MAnuv_2,2.221 //
GSP33madhanuu:1566: svarūpaṃ vastuno bhedo yanna tasya grahe grahaḥ /
GSP33madhanuu:1567: anyathāsyāmunā bheda iti vaktuṃ na yujyate // MAnuv_2,2.223 //
GSP33madhanuu:1569: syāt pratītivirodhācca na hi kaścit tathā vadet // MAnuv_2,2.224 //
GSP33madhanuu:1571: viśeṣaṇaṃ viśeṣyaṃ ca tadbhāvaścaiva gṛhyate // MAnuv_2,2.225 //
GSP33madhanuu:1572: ko virodhaḥ svarūpeṇa gṛhīto bheda eva tu /
GSP33madhanuu:1574: kiñca bhedaḥ kathaṃ grāhya iti yaḥ paripṛcchati /
GSP33madhanuu:1577: anyatvaṃ yadi siddhaṃ syāt kathamanyonyasaṃśrayaḥ // MAnuv_2,2.228 //
GSP33madhanuu:1588: tatra santatibhedaśca svabhedo bheda eva ca /
GSP33madhanuu:1590: ityetadapi no yuktaṃ na hi jñānatayā jagat /
GSP33madhanuu:1599: tadrūpameva taditi niyamaḥ kena vāryate // MAnuv_2,2.237 //
GSP33madhanuu:1603: aśeṣamāviruddhaṃ ca nirmānaṃ vyāhataṃ sadā // MAnuv_2,2.239 //
GSP33madhanuu:1605: svavyāhatatvamityādyā doṣāḥ sarve bhavanti hi // MAnuv_2,2.240 //
GSP33madhanuu:1611: lakṣaṇasya nivṛttau tu syānna taccetane kvacit // MAnuv_2,2.243 //
GSP33madhanuu:1614: bhautikaṃ tveva rūpādi vyāptaṃ nāśena no mate /
GSP33madhanuu:1619: alokākāśamāptasya kathaṃ na vikṛtiśca sā // MAnuv_2,2.247 //
GSP33madhanuu:1621: saṃsthānāpagamaścet sa na hi bhūsāgarādiṣu // MAnuv_2,2.248 //
GSP33madhanuu:1626: dehavyāptyai viśeṣaḥ kastasyāḥ sthāsnutanau ca nuḥ // MAnuv_2,2.250 //
GSP33madhanuu:1627: gītāt puṣpaphalāvāptiḥ sparśāt kārśyaṃ rasāt sthitiḥ /
GSP33madhanuu:1628: api vṛkṣasya dṛśyanta iti nānātmatā bhavet /
GSP33madhanuu:1633: nopādeyaṃ mataṃ hyasya devasya stuhi gartagam // MAnuv_2,2.253 //
GSP33madhanuu:1635: yad viṣṇorupamaṃ hantuṃ rudramākṛṣṭate mayā // MAnuv_2,2.254 //
GSP33madhanuu:1636: dhanuryaṃ kāmaye taṃ tamugraṃ mā śiśnadevatāḥ /
GSP33madhanuu:1645: kartṛtvena na yujyeta dehino jñānadṛṣṭitaḥ // MAnuv_2,2.259 //
GSP33madhanuu:1646: na ca dehādivad viśvamasya syād bhogasambhavāt /
GSP33madhanuu:1647: adhiṣṭhāne sthitaḥ kartā kāryaṃ kurvan pratīyate /
GSP33madhanuu:1652: manobuddhayaṅgitāṃ viṣṇorlakṣayāmo ya eva saḥ // MAnuv_2,2.262 //
GSP33madhanuu:1654: deho viṣṇorna te viṣṇo vāsudevo 'grato 'bhavat // MAnuv_2,2.263 //
GSP33madhanuu:1655: eko nārāyaṇastvāsīnna brahmā na ca śaṅkaraḥ /
GSP33madhanuu:1658: jñānajñānaḥ sukhasukhaḥ sa viṣṇuḥ paramākṣaraḥ // MAnuv_2,2.265 //
GSP33madhanuu:1660: priyaṃ tasya śire modapramodau ca bhujau hareḥ // MAnuv_2,2.266 //
GSP33madhanuu:1661: ānando madhyato brahma pucchaṃ nānyadabhūt kvacit /
GSP33madhanuu:1668: avirodho virodhaśca mānenaiva hi gamyate // MAnuv_2,2.270 //
GSP33madhanuu:1669: ata uktaṃ samastaṃ ca vāsudevasya yujyate /
GSP33madhanuu:1671: nāmāni sarvāṇi ca yameko yo devanāmadhāḥ /
GSP33madhanuu:1672: viṣṇunāmāni nānyasya sarvanāmā hariḥ svayam // MAnuv_2,2.272 //
GSP33madhanuu:1686: dṛṣṭā pumbhyaḥ sadā sṛṣṭiḥ strīpumbhyo vā viśeṣataḥ /
GSP33madhanuu:1687: kevalābhyo na hi strībhyastata utpattyasambhavāt // MAnuv_2,2.279 //
GSP33madhanuu:1694: na yujyate hyatastvīśa eka eva prayojakaḥ /
GSP33madhanuu:1695: uktadoṣaśca tatpakṣa iti naivātra dūṣyate // MAnuv_2,2.283 //
GSP33madhanuu:1697: satāṃ jugupsitatvācca nāṅgīkāryaṃ hi tanmatam // MAnuv_2,2.284 //
GSP33madhanuu:1699: sūtrāṇyativiruddhaṃ tad yata āha sa bhārate // MAnuv_2,2.285 //
GSP33madhanuu:1704: iti gītā ca tacchāstrasaṅkṣepa iti hīritam /
GSP33madhanuu:1705: vedena pañcarātreṇa bhaktayā yajñena caiva hi // MAnuv_2,2.288 //
GSP33madhanuu:1707: iti vārāhavacanaṃ ślokā iti vacaḥ śrutau // MAnuv_2,2.289 //
GSP33madhanuu:1709: pañcarātraṃ ca vedāśca vidyaikaiva dvidheyate // MAnuv_2,2.290 //
GSP33madhanuu:1711: kathamevātra doṣaḥ ka utpattirjño 'ta ityapi // MAnuv_2,2.291 //
GSP33madhanuu:1715: na hi saṃsārasāditvaṃ pañcarātroditaṃ kvacit // MAnuv_2,2.293 //
GSP33madhanuu:1724: dūṣaṇaṃ pañcarātrasya vīkṣāyāmapi na kṣamam // MAnuv_2,2.297 //
GSP33madhanuu:1728: tato bhūya ivāpsyanti ye tasyā naiva nindakāḥ // MAnuv_2,2.299 //
GSP33madhanuu:1729: tato vidyāmavidyāṃ ca yo jānātyubhayaṃ saha /
GSP33madhanuu:1737: etat sarvaṃ sataḥ sāmyaṃ dvāravaiyarthyameva ca // MAnuv_2,3.3 //
GSP33madhanuu:1741: tatra tatra parijñānaṃ guṇasāmyaśrutī tathā // MAnuv_2,3.5 //
GSP33madhanuu:1745: mukhyatā śaktimattvaṃ ca vairūpyaṃ sarvasaṅgrahaḥ // MAnuv_2,3.7 //
GSP33madhanuu:1753: yadyanākāśatā pūrvaṃ kiṃ mūrtanibiḍaṃ jagat // MAnuv_2,3.10 //
GSP33madhanuu:1755: mūrtadravyāṇi cākāśe sthitānyeva hi sarvadā // MAnuv_2,3.11 //
GSP33madhanuu:1760: pradeśa iti vijñeyaṃ nityaṃ notpadyate hi tat // MAnuv_2,3.13 //
GSP33madhanuu:1763: prakṛtiḥ puruṣaḥ kāla ityete ca samastaśaḥ /
GSP33madhanuu:1776: ramāyā naiva janmāsti caitanyasyāpi kevalam // MAnuv_2,3.21 //
GSP33madhanuu:1778: vyaktirnāma viśeṣo 'sti tasmāt tadvaśataiva hi // MAnuv_2,3.22 //
GSP33madhanuu:1780: naivotpattiḥ kathamapi na svatantraṃ tato 'param // MAnuv_2,3.23 //
GSP33madhanuu:1782: kṛtvā bhogān pradāyaiva caikyamāpādayet punaḥ // MAnuv_2,3.24 //
GSP33madhanuu:1788: na tad yuktaṃ yato viṣṇuḥ pṛthagevābhidhīyate /
GSP33madhanuu:1792: sarge 'pi nopajāyante praḷaye na vyathanti ca // MAnuv_2,3.28 //
GSP33madhanuu:1794: tatra paryeti jakṣaṃśca krīḍannapi sadā sukhī // MAnuv_2,3.29 //
GSP33madhanuu:1795: ācakṣva me mokṣaṃ dhīrā yaṃ pravadanti tam /
GSP33madhanuu:1796: ityakta āha vāgdevī paraṃ mokṣaṃ prajāpateḥ // MAnuv_2,3.30 //
GSP33madhanuu:1804: kartṛtvāt saguṇaṃ brahma puruṣaṃ puruṣarṣabham // MAnuv_2,3.34 //
GSP33madhanuu:1807: ṛcāṃ tvaḥ poṣamāste ca pareṇa preritāḥ sadā /
GSP33madhanuu:1815: iti cet sādhyadharmo 'yaṃ sannasan vā navobhayam // MAnuv_2,3.39 //
GSP33madhanuu:1817: nobhayaṃ cenna siddhaṃ taditi mānasya dūṣaṇam // MAnuv_2,3.40 //
GSP33madhanuu:1819: anumānena cet saiva hyanavasthā bhaviṣyati // MAnuv_2,3.41 //
GSP33madhanuu:1825: bādhāyogāt sata iti bādhābhāvata eva hi // MAnuv_2,3.44 //
GSP33madhanuu:1826: viṣayasya kuto bādho vidyamānaṃ hi bādhyate /
GSP33madhanuu:1827: na hi vandhyāsuto vadhyo yajñadatto hi vadhyate // MAnuv_2,3.45 //
GSP33madhanuu:1828: bādhāyogaḥ sata iti vyāptireṣā kva dṛśyate /
GSP33madhanuu:1829: kaścāyaṃ bādha uddiṣṭo na hi nāśo 'sato bhavet /
GSP33madhanuu:1835: na copamā bhavedatra pratyakṣāt sattvameva ca /
GSP33madhanuu:1843: sa eva dharmiṇo grāhī tadabhedaḥ kathaṃ bhavet /
GSP33madhanuu:1844: yat svarūpagrahe mānaṃ taddharme na kathaṃ bhavet // MAnuv_2,3.53 //
GSP33madhanuu:1846: na cedekamamānaṃ tad dvayamapyatra no bhavet // MAnuv_2,3.54 //
GSP33madhanuu:1849: na ca mānāntaropeyaṃ brahma tad bhavati kvacit /
GSP33madhanuu:1854: na hi bādhaḥ kvacid dṛṣṭo duḥkhādyanubhavasya tu // MAnuv_2,3.58 //
GSP33madhanuu:1856: aduḥkhitāśrutiḥ kena na bhrāntiriti gamyate // MAnuv_2,3.59 //
GSP33madhanuu:1858: taccenmānaṃ gṛhītaṃ te kiṃ duḥkhānubhave bhramaḥ // MAnuv_2,3.60 //
GSP33madhanuu:1860: bādho yadyanubhūte 'rthe kathaṃ nirṇaya īyate // MAnuv_2,3.61 //
GSP33madhanuu:1861: ko 'pi hy artho na niścetuṃ śakyate bhramavādinā /
GSP33madhanuu:1863: ekasya bhramatā tatra parasyābhramatā kutaḥ // MAnuv_2,3.62 //
GSP33madhanuu:1864: bhramatvamabhramatvaṃ ca sarvaṃ vedyaṃ hi sākṣiṇā /
GSP33madhanuu:1865: sa cet sākṣī kvacid duṣyaḥ kathaṃ nirṇaya īyate // MAnuv_2,3.63 //
GSP33madhanuu:1867: ūrīkṛtya ca tān sarvān vyavahāraḥ pravartate /
GSP33madhanuu:1870: sākṣī nirdoṣa evaikaḥ sadāṅgīkārya eva naḥ // MAnuv_2,3.65 //
GSP33madhanuu:1871: śuddhaḥ sākṣī yadā siddho duḥkhitvaṃ vāryate katham /

GSP33madhanuu:2637: yo dviṣṭād vibudhaśreṣṭhaṃ devaṃ nārāyaṇaṃ prabhum /

GSP33madhanuu:2652: yadi te 'pi niṣiddhayante kiṃ noktiste niṣiddhayate /

GSP33madhanuu:2659: prāmāṇye saṃśayaḥ kiṃ syāt tayoḥ puruṣayorapi /

GSP33madhanuu:2665: yadyakṣajasya mātvaṃ syādāgamasya kathaṃ na tat /

GSP33madhanuu:2672: viṣayān prati sthitaṃ hyakṣaṃ pratyakṣamiti gīyate /
GSP33madhanuu:2674: ā samantād gamayati dharmādharmau paraṃ padam /
GSP33madhanuu:2678: ato 'numā kathaṃ dharmaṃ pudgalaṃ cāpi darśayet /

GSP33madhanuu:2682: sukhasyābhāvatā kena na ca syāt kiṃ viparyayaḥ // MAnuv_3,3.133 //
GSP33madhanuu:2683: yadi bhāvo 'pi kaścit syāt tasyaivābhāvatā kutaḥ /
GSP33madhanuu:2685: abhāvābhāvatā yat syāt kiṃ naśchinnaṃ tadā bhavet /

GSP33madhanuu:2734: viśvataḥ paramāṃ nityaṃ viśvaṃ nārāyaṇaṃ harim /

GSP33madhanuu:2743: puruṣeṇedaṃ vyāptamiti brāhmaṇaṃ cāha taṃ prati /
GSP33madhanuu:2744: etāvānasya mahimeti mahimno vaco hi tat // MAnuv_3,3.161 //
GSP33madhanuu:2749: tad yatheti śruteścaiva tataḥ karmakṣayo bhavet // MAnuv_3,3.163 //

GSP33madhanuu:2759: nānyaḥ panthā iti hyeva nivārayati sādaram // MAnuv_3,3.167 //

GSP33madhanuu:2790: varuṇāgnyantarā tatra nāradaḥ prāya indravat // MAnuv_3,3.181 //

GSP33madhanuu:2941: ahaṃ mahendro nirṛtiḥ pracetāḥ somo 'gnirīśaḥ pavano 'rko viriñcaḥ /

GSP33madhanuu:2987: paśyanti somasūryau tu manasthaṃ parameśvaram // MAnuv_3,4.78 //

GSP33madhanuu:3054: parā pūrveṣāṃ sakhyā vṛṇakti vitarturāṇo aparebhireti /

GSP33madhanuu:3070: dānaṃ damaśca yajñaśca svādhyāyastapa ārjavam // MAnuv_3,4.117 //
GSP33madhanuu:3081: māmaprāpyaiva kaunteya tato yāntyadhamāṃ gatim // MAnuv_3,4.122 //
GSP33madhanuu:3082: dvividho bhūtasargo 'tra daiva āsura eva ca /
GSP33madhanuu:3084: devānāṃ paramo dharmaḥ sadā yajñādikāḥ kriyāḥ /
GSP33madhanuu:3089: śive sūrye tathā devyāṃ svabhāvo mānuṣaḥ smṛtaḥ // MAnuv_3,4.126 //
GSP33madhanuu:3098: adṛṣṭāśced viśeṣo 'yamanāditvaṃ kuto na tat // MAnuv_3,4.130 //
GSP33madhanuu:3101: bahutvaṃ ca viśeṣeṇa na bhedena kathañcana /
GSP33madhanuu:3102: pratyabhijñā ca yeṣāṃ na te 'pi tanmuṣyadṛṣṭayaḥ // MAnuv_3,4.132 //
GSP33madhanuu:3103: bhedaṃ naiva prapaśyanti bhedamanyebhya eva ca /
GSP33madhanuu:3110: vākyaṃ kvaciddhi sammugdhadarśanaṃ tatra gamyate // MAnuv_3,4.136 //
GSP33madhanuu:3112: parīkṣādarśane naiva dṛśyate kenacit kvacit // MAnuv_3,4.137 //
GSP33madhanuu:3114: nirdoṣameva rudro 'drāṅ nirdoṣaṃ taṃ purandaraḥ // MAnuv_3,4.138 //
GSP33madhanuu:3117: iti barkuśruteścaiva sadoṣaṃ nāsya darśanam // MAnuv_3,4.139 //
GSP33madhanuu:3120: iti paiṅgiśrutiścaiva prāha nirdoṣatāṃ hareḥ // MAnuv_3,4.140 //
GSP33madhanuu:3122: parīkṣādarśane naiva dṛśyo doṣo hareḥ kvacit /
GSP33madhanuu:3123: iti paiṅgiśrutiścāha pramāṇaṃ hi parīkṣitam // MAnuv_3,4.141 //
GSP33madhanuu:3126: sudṛḍho nirṇayo yatra jñeyaṃ tat sākṣidarśanam // MAnuv_3,4.142 //
GSP33madhanuu:3128: sākṣisiddhā na kaściddhi tatra saṃśayavān kvacit /
GSP33madhanuu:3129: yat kvacid vyabhicārī syād darśanaṃ mānasaṃ hi tat // MAnuv_3,4.143 //
GSP33madhanuu:3131: prāmāṇyaṃ sugṛhītaṃ syāt tat parīkṣitadarśanam // MAnuv_3,4.144 //
GSP33madhanuu:3138: ato na sarvamānānāṃ prāmāṇyaṃ niścitaṃ bhavet /
GSP33madhanuu:3139: sākṣiṇā niścitaṃ yatra tat prāmāṇyasvalakṣaṇam // MAnuv_3,4.148 //
GSP33madhanuu:3140: na hi kaścit sukhādyeṣu saṃśayaṃ kurute janaḥ /
GSP33madhanuu:3143: doṣābhāvādikaṃ caiva sākṣī samyak prapaśyati // MAnuv_3,4.150 //
GSP33madhanuu:3144: tat parīkṣitamānena na doṣo viṣṇavi kvacit /
GSP33madhanuu:3150: āgamena hi viṣṇutvaṃ jñātvā doṣo 'tra kalpyate /
GSP33madhanuu:3151: na cet syāt doṣavānanyaḥ śāstrasiddhaṃ hi lakṣaṇam // MAnuv_3,4.154 //
GSP33madhanuu:3153: na viṣṇordeṣavattve hi pratyakṣaṃ vartate svataḥ // MAnuv_3,4.155 //
GSP33madhanuu:3157: tadvirodhe kathaṃ mānaṃ tat tatra ca bhaviṣyati // MAnuv_3,4.157 //
GSP33madhanuu:3159: yadyevaṃ devadattādibhramaḥ kiṃ nākṣajaṃ bhavet // MAnuv_3,4.158 //
GSP33madhanuu:3164: sarvaṃ tadupajīvyaiva pramāṇaṃ vartate yataḥ // MAnuv_3,4.160 //
GSP33madhanuu:3166: vihāya yasmātkasmāccit svarūpasyaiva ced yadi // MAnuv_3,4.161 //
GSP33madhanuu:3170: astu no naiva hāniḥ syāt svapakṣaścāyamañjasā // MAnuv_3,4.163 //
GSP33madhanuu:3174: vyāvartayanti tadrūpaṃ caitramātrad vinaiva hi // MAnuv_3,4.165 //
GSP33madhanuu:3178: tāvanmātraṃ yadīṣyaṃ syāt sarvajñatvaṃ kuto na tat // MAnuv_3,4.167 //
GSP33madhanuu:3182: iti ceccetanatvaṃ ca jñatvaṃ na jñeyavarjitam // MAnuv_3,4.169 //
GSP33madhanuu:3185: svaśabdārtha iti proktaḥ svarūpaṃ nāma kiṃ na cet // MAnuv_3,4.170 //
GSP33madhanuu:3187: na svarūpābhidhāyi syād vaiyarthyaṃ svaravasya yat // MAnuv_3,4.171 //
GSP33madhanuu:3190: na jñeyajñātṛhīnaṃ hi jñānaṃ nāma kvacid bhavet /
GSP33madhanuu:3191: jñeyajñānavihīnaśca jña ityatra ca na pramā // MAnuv_3,4.173 //
GSP33madhanuu:3193: hīnaṃ bhojanameva syāt tāḍanaṃ kartṛtāḍyataḥ // MAnuv_3,4.174 //
GSP33madhanuu:3195: vācyavaktṛvihīnā syānnahi sā caiva tādṛśī // MAnuv_3,4.175 //
GSP33madhanuu:3196: draṣṭāro vedavāco hi santi vācyāni cāñjasā /
GSP33madhanuu:3197: nityo draṣṭā ca vācyaśca bhagavāneva ca svayam // MAnuv_3,4.176 //
GSP33madhanuu:3198: na hi vaktṛvihīnā ca vācyahīnāpi vāk kvacit /
GSP33madhanuu:3199: jñātṛjñeyavihīnaṃ ca jñānamevaṃ na tad bhavet // MAnuv_3,4.177 //
GSP33madhanuu:3203: sarveṇa saha tad vākyāmarthaśca yadi gṛhyate /
GSP33madhanuu:3204: tadabhāvena sarvasya nāpalāpo bhavet tadā // MAnuv_3,4.179 //
GSP33madhanuu:3205: na gṛhyate ced tannyāyādapalāpo na hi kvacit /
GSP33madhanuu:3212: mukhyārthe vidyamāne tu kva sāvarjñyaṃ niṣiddhayate // MAnuv_3,4.183 //
GSP33madhanuu:3214: apalāpo 'pi sarvasya na kathañcana yujyate // MAnuv_3,4.184 //
GSP33madhanuu:3216: muktānāṃ tāratamyaṃ ca mānairuktairna cālyate // MAnuv_3,4.185 //
GSP33madhanuu:3217: jñānino 'pi yato nityaṃ kurvanti śubhameva hi /
GSP33madhanuu:3218: tāratamyaṃ tu muktau ca tenaivādhyavasīyate // MAnuv_3,4.186 //
GSP33madhanuu:3219: tāratamyaṃ na cenmuktau kutaḥ kuryuḥ śubhaṃ punaḥ /
GSP33madhanuu:3220: kṛcchreṇāpi tapo jñānaṃ karmāpyete caranti hi // MAnuv_3,4.187 //
GSP33madhanuu:3225: phalavattve pramāṇaṃ cet tatra jñasya samaṃ hi tat // MAnuv_3,4.189 //
GSP33madhanuu:3229: jñānino 'pi yatastena kartavyaṃ śubhameva taiḥ // MAnuv_3,4.191 //
GSP33madhanuu:3230: upāste sa ya ātmānaṃ kṣīyate nāsya karma ha /
GSP33madhanuu:3231: asmāddhayevātmano yadyat kāmayet sṛjate ca tat // MAnuv_3,4.192 //
GSP33madhanuu:3236: na hi jñānaṃ vinā kvāpi phalasyākṣayatā bhavet /
GSP33madhanuu:3249: snehayogo 'pi tadvat syād viśeṣo jñānagocaraḥ // MAnuv_3,4.200 //
GSP33madhanuu:3251: vadanti śrutayaḥ so 'yaṃ viśeṣo 'pi hyudīryate // MAnuv_3,4.201 //
GSP33madhanuu:3252: bhaktirjñānamiti kvāpi na hi dveṣayutā dṛśiḥ /
GSP33madhanuu:3254: cetanasya dvayaṃ bhogyaṃ saṃsāro muktireva ca /
GSP33madhanuu:3256: muktiśca dvividhā tatra sukhaṃ nityaṃ tathāparam /
GSP33madhanuu:3258: kāmyaṃ karma niṣiddhaṃ ca sājñānamiti niścayaḥ // MAnuv_3,4.204 //
GSP33madhanuu:3262: muktiśabdodito mokṣaṃ svabhaktānāṃ karoti yat // MAnuv_3,4.206 //
GSP33madhanuu:3265: vadanti śrutayaḥ sarvāḥ purāṇānyāgamā api // MAnuv_3,4.207 //
GSP33madhanuu:3266: yadi dveṣeṇa muktiḥ syād vaktavyo doṣasañcayaḥ /
GSP33madhanuu:3273: tamo dveṣeṇa saṃyānti bhaktayā muktiṃ tathaiva ca /
GSP33madhanuu:3278: vācakatvaṃ hi tātparyaṃ yadarthā akhilā ravāḥ /
GSP33madhanuu:3280: ato vijñānabhaktibhyāṃ puruṣārthaḥ paro bhavet // MAnuv_3,4.213 //
GSP33madhanuu:3281: yasya deve parā bhaktiryathā deve tathā gurau /
GSP33madhanuu:3282: tasyaite kathitā hyarthāḥ prakāśante mahātmanaḥ // MAnuv_3,4.214 //
GSP33madhanuu:3283: bhaktyā jñānaṃ tato bhaktistato dṛṣṭistataśca sā /
GSP33madhanuu:3284: tato muktistato bhaktiḥ saiva syāt sukharūpiṇī // MAnuv_3,4.215//
GSP33madhanuu:3287: nāhaṃ vedairna tapasā na dānena nacejyayā /
GSP33madhanuu:3290: jñātuṃ draṣṭuṃ ca tattvena praveṣyuṃ ca parantapa // MAnuv_3,4.218 //
GSP33madhanuu:3292: na ca prasādamāpnoti dveṣād bhaktyā tamāpnuyāt /
GSP33madhanuu:3294: ye pṛthag vihitā viṣṇorguṇā vedena sādaram /
GSP33madhanuu:3297: doṣābhāvāśca ye vedairuditā avihāya tān // MAnuv_3,4.221 //
GSP33madhanuu:3299: evaṃ bṛhatsaṃhitāvāk siddhānto hi tadīritaḥ // MAnuv_3,4.222 //
GSP33madhanuu:3302: yo hi bhaktaḥ pradhāne syāt tadīyeṣvapi bhaktimān /
GSP33madhanuu:3305: bhaktidoṣo hyasau yanna tadbhakteṣvapi bhaktimān // MAnuv_3,4.225 //
GSP33madhanuu:3312: teṣu bhaktiḥ krameṇaiva kāryā nityaṃ mumukṣubhiḥ /
GSP33madhanuu:3313: sarve 'pi guravaścaite puruṣasya sadaiva hi // MAnuv_3,4.229 //
GSP33madhanuu:3314: tasmāt pūjyāśca namyāśca dhyeyāśca parito harim /
GSP33madhanuu:3325: bhaktiryato yathā svasminnityādyā yuktiratra ca // MAnuv_3,4.234 //
GSP33madhanuu:3327: prītidaiva hareryasmād bhaktiḥ sā svopagā yathā // MAnuv_3,4.235 //
GSP33madhanuu:3329: svātantryatāratamyena phalaṃ hi phalināṃ bhavet // MAnuv_3,4.236 //
GSP33madhanuu:3331: ājñayā cānyagaṃ naiva bhogāya bhavati kvacit // MAnuv_3,4.237 //
GSP33madhanuu:3336: prerayanti hi te jīvān puṇyapāpeṣu nityaśaḥ /
GSP33madhanuu:3339: haripūjeti coddeśāt kathaṃ na śubhamāpnuyuḥ // MAnuv_3,4.241 //
GSP33madhanuu:3342: devā eva hi devānāṃ viśiṣṭā viniyāmakāḥ /
GSP33madhanuu:3346: devānāmanyagaṃ cāpi teṣu yad brahmaṇo hi tat // MAnuv_3,4.244 //
GSP33madhanuu:3352: krameṇaiva yathāśakti yathā ye ye prayojakāḥ // MAnuv_3,4.247 //
GSP33madhanuu:3353: prerakā api pāpānāṃ na devāḥ pāpamāpnuyuḥ /
GSP33madhanuu:3354: iti prakāśikāyāṃ hi provāca harirañjasā // MAnuv_3,4.248 //
GSP33madhanuu:3355: yadyapyevaṃ surāṇāṃ ca daityānāṃ ca mahat phalam /
GSP33madhanuu:3356: śubhāśubhebhya evañca kartuśca syād yathoditam // MAnuv_3,4.249 //
GSP33madhanuu:3360: iti tattvavivekoktaṃ svayaṃ bhagavatā vacaḥ // MAnuv_3,4.251 //
GSP33madhanuu:3364: devāḥ sahasraguṇitaṃ kramāt tasmād yathottaram // MAnuv_3,4.253 //
GSP33madhanuu:3367: yuktaṃ ca tanna godātā gomātraphalamāpnuyāt // MAnuv_3,4.254 //
GSP33madhanuu:3369: bhaktiṃ mayi parāṃ kṛtvā māmevaiṣyatyasaṃśayaḥ // MAnuv_3,4.255 //
GSP33madhanuu:3371: bhavitā na ca me tasmādanyaḥ priyataro bhuvi /
GSP33madhanuu:3374: jñānaṃ dṛṣṭaphalaṃ proktaṃ muktiścehaiva labhyate // MAnuv_3,4.257 //
GSP33madhanuu:3383: śuśrāvogratapā nāma yogyo rudrapadasya yaḥ // MAnuv_4,1.4 //
GSP33madhanuu:3384: sārddhaṃ parārddhaṃ viṣṇostu guṇān bhaktayā sadodyataḥ /
GSP33madhanuu:3394: ityuktaṃ viṣṇunā sākṣād granthe sattatvasañjñite // MAnuv_4,1.8 //
GSP33madhanuu:3396: ātmā brahma mahāṃstāraḥ parameśaḥ śuciśravāḥ // MAnuv_4,1.9 //
GSP33madhanuu:3404: tasmādupāsyo viṣṇuriti jñātavyaḥ sajjanaiḥ sadā // MAnuv_4,1.13 //
GSP33madhanuu:3411: mama svāmī harirnityaṃ sarvasya patireva ca /
GSP33madhanuu:3412: iti dhyeyaḥ sarvadaiva bhagavān viṣṇuravyayaḥ // MAnuv_4,1.16 //
GSP33madhanuu:3416: kiṃ tena na kṛtaṃ pāpaṃ coreṇātmāpahāriṇā // MAnuv_4,1.18 //
GSP33madhanuu:3418: kiṃ tena na kṛtaṃ pāpaṃ coreṇeśāpahāriṇā // MAnuv_4,1.19 //
GSP33madhanuu:3420: kiṃ tena na kṛtaṃ pāpaṃ coreṇa brahmacāriṇā // MAnuv_4,1.20 //
GSP33madhanuu:3423: kiṃ tena na kṛtaṃ pāpaṃ cāreṇeśāpahāriṇā // MAnuv_4,1.21 //
GSP33madhanuu:3424: yo 'nyad viṣṇuriti dhyāyejjānīyād vā hariṃ tathā /
GSP33madhanuu:3425: andhe tamasi majjet sa yatra naivotthitiḥ kvacit // MAnuv_4,1.22 //
GSP33madhanuu:3426: yo 'nyad viṣṇuriti dhyāyed viṣṇuranyaditi sma vā /
GSP33madhanuu:3428: yo 'nyad viṣṇuriti dhyāyed viṣṇuranyaditi sma vā /
GSP33madhanuu:3429: mahātamasi magnasya tasya naivotthitiḥ kvacit // MAnuv_4,1.24 //
GSP33madhanuu:3436: na kiñcidanyathā jñeyaṃ dhyeyaṃ vā tena kutracit /
GSP33madhanuu:3437: kimu sarvottamo viṣṇurjñeyo nīcatayā kvacit // MAnuv_4,1.28 //
GSP33madhanuu:3438: tasmād vastu yathārūpaṃ jñeyaṃ dhyeyaṃ ca sarvadā /
GSP33madhanuu:3439: kāraṇaṃ puruṣārthasya nānyathā bhavati kvacit // MAnuv_4,1.29 //
GSP33madhanuu:3442: ityabhipretya na hi sa ityāha bhagavān prabhuḥ /
GSP33madhanuu:3444: brahmeti ca sadā dhyeyo bhagavān viṣṇurañjasā /
GSP33madhanuu:3445: utkṛṣṭo brahmaśabdārthaḥ pūrṇatvaṃ brahmatā yataḥ // MAnuv_4,1.32 //
GSP33madhanuu:3448: iti prakāśikāyāṃ ca vacanaṃ viṣṇuneritam // MAnuv_4,1.33 //
GSP33madhanuu:3450: ātmaśabdaṃ yato hetuṃ kṛtvā jīvaṃ nyavārayat /
GSP33madhanuu:3451: svaśabdāt prāṇabhṛccaiva nokta ityeva vedarāṭ // MAnuv_4,1.34 //
GSP33madhanuu:3455: na vadanti yato nāptā kvāpi tairguṇapūrṇatā /
GSP33madhanuu:3459: bhedasya vyapadeśaṃ ca sthitiṃ cādanameva ca /
GSP33madhanuu:3463: uta neti vikalpe tu yadi syād vyāvahārikam /
GSP33madhanuu:3464: tasyāpi bādhyatā cet syād bhedaḥ syāt pāramārthikaḥ // MAnuv_4,1.40 //
GSP33madhanuu:3467: anyasya satyataiva syāditi kena nivāryate // MAnuv_4,1.41 //
GSP33madhanuu:3470: na svapne 'pi dvayaṃ mithyā tatraikaṃ satyameva hi /
GSP33madhanuu:3471: bhāvābhāvāvubhau tatra kathaṃ mithyā bhaviṣyataḥ // MAnuv_4,1.43 //
GSP33madhanuu:3472: bhāvasya hi niṣedhe tu nābhāvasya niṣedhanam /
GSP33madhanuu:3473: svavāco 'satyatā cet syāt tasmād bhedasya satyatā // MAnuv_4,1.44 //
GSP33madhanuu:3477: pratīke viṣṇurityeva tasmāt kāryā hyupāsanā // MAnuv_4,1.46 //
GSP33madhanuu:3478: na ca viṣṇuḥ pratīkaṃ yat tasmānnātmetyupāsanā /
GSP33madhanuu:3485: brahmaṇo nīcatādhyānādanarthaḥ kiṃ na jāyate // MAnuv_4,1.49 //
GSP33madhanuu:3487: nīcasya svātmatādhyāne kupyati brahma lokavat // MAnuv_4,1.50 //
GSP33madhanuu:3489: ko viśeṣaḥ parijñāte nṛpeṇa syāt kathañcana // MAnuv_4,1.51 //
GSP33madhanuu:3491: rājavat kiṃ na kopaḥ syād rājño loke hi paśyati // MAnuv_4,1.52 //
GSP33madhanuu:3492: rājñastu purataḥ prokte caṇḍālaṃ nṛpa ityapi /
GSP33madhanuu:3493: ātmānaṃ sa iti proktamitivaddhayeva kupyati // MAnuv_4,1.53 //
GSP33madhanuu:3495: ayaṃ rājā tvamityukte caṇḍāle 'tha nṛpe 'pi ca /
GSP33madhanuu:3496: caṇḍāla iti tu prokte samameva hi dūṣaṇam // MAnuv_4,1.54 //
GSP33madhanuu:3497: dhyāte tvekasya tadbhāve tadbhāvo 'nyasya kiṃ na tat /
GSP33madhanuu:3501: tathopāsyāñjasā dṛṣṭaṃ brahma pāpaṃ ca bhasmasāt /
GSP33madhanuu:3506: karma vidyāyutaṃ paścānmokṣe vīryapradaṃ tviti // MAnuv_4,1.58 //
GSP33madhanuu:3507: tato bhogena puṇyaṃ ca kṣapayitvetarat tathā /
GSP33madhanuu:3517: utkrāntimārgau devānāṃ na prāyeṇa bhaviṣyataḥ // MAnuv_4,2.1 //
GSP33madhanuu:3519: phalaṃ mokṣa iti proktaḥ kramāt pādeṣu coditaḥ // MAnuv_4,2.2 //
GSP33madhanuu:3520: sraṣṭṛṣveva tu sṛjyānāṃ praveśo brahmaṇo laye /
GSP33madhanuu:3523: yataḥ sṛjyasya devasya naivotkrāntistato bhavet // MAnuv_4,2.4 //
GSP33madhanuu:3525: kathaṃ mārgo bhavet teṣāṃ viśatāmuttamaṃ svataḥ // MAnuv_4,2.5 //
GSP33madhanuu:3526: jātānāṃ mānuṣe loke devānāṃ ca kadācana /
GSP33madhanuu:3527: utkrāntimārgau bhavato na tadā muktiriṣyate // MAnuv_4,2.6 //
GSP33madhanuu:3528: anyeṣāmapi sākṣāttu muktiḥ prāpyāpi taṃ harim /
GSP33madhanuu:3529: sahaiva brahmaṇā bhūyāditi śāstrasya nirṇayaḥ // MAnuv_4,2.7 //
GSP33madhanuu:3531: avyākṛtaṃ viśati yarhi guṇatrayātmā kālaṃ paraṃ svamanubhūya paraḥ svayambhūḥ // MAnuv_4,2.8 //
GSP33madhanuu:3532: evaṃ paretya bhagavantamanupraviṣṭā ye yogino jitamarunmanaso virāgāḥ /
GSP33madhanuu:3533: tenaiva sākamamṛtaṃ puruṣaṃ purāṇaṃ brahma pradhānamupayāntyagatābhimānāḥ // MAnuv_4,2.9 //
GSP33madhanuu:3536: prāptā api paraṃ devaṃ sahaiva brahmaṇā punaḥ /
GSP33madhanuu:3539: bhogastu sarvadevānāṃ narādīnāṃ ca vidyate // MAnuv_4,2.12 //
GSP33madhanuu:3541: ucyate dehagānāṃ ca vṛttīnāmevameva tu // MAnuv_4,2.13 //
GSP33madhanuu:3543: nānā vadanti puṃsāṃ hi matayo guṇabhedataḥ /
GSP33madhanuu:3548: bahaḷā cātiviśadā spaṣṭā caiva śriyo matiḥ // MAnuv_4,2.16 //
GSP33madhanuu:3556: na tādṛśī brahmaṇastu prāya eva śriyo yathā // MAnuv_4,2.19 //
GSP33madhanuu:3558: agnijvālāvadeva syāt smṛtigānāṃ dṛśo bhavaḥ // MAnuv_4,2.20 //
GSP33madhanuu:3566: iti tat kena mānena mokṣarūpaṃ pradṛśyate /
GSP33madhanuu:3570: dūrordhvagamane duḥkhamiti sādhyānugo na saḥ // MAnuv_4,2.25 //
GSP33madhanuu:3572: upādhiḥ pratirūpaṃ hi sādhanaṃ tannacāparam // MAnuv_4,2.26 //
GSP33madhanuu:3574: gatitvaṃ yatra dehitvamiti yat sādhanānugam // MAnuv_4,2.27 //
GSP33madhanuu:3576: nāpasiddhāntatā doṣaḥ prasaṅge yadi sā bhavet /
GSP33madhanuu:3577: tadaivātiprasaṅgaḥ syānna pasaṅgaḥ kvacid bhavet // MAnuv_4,2.28 //
GSP33madhanuu:3579: so 'pītyukte vadet kiṃ sa tasmād vedodito bhavet // MAnuv_4,2.29 //
GSP33madhanuu:3581: cakāra saugatamataṃ mohāyaiva cakāra yat // MAnuv_4,2.30 //
GSP33madhanuu:3586: iti tatra tu ye śūnyaṃ vadantyajñānamohitaḥ /
GSP33madhanuu:3587: te mokṣaṃ tādṛśaṃ brūyurniśśaṅkaṃ māyino yathā // MAnuv_4,2.33 //
GSP33madhanuu:3592: na sattvaṃ naiva cāsattvaṃ śūnyatattvasya vidyate /
GSP33madhanuu:3593: na sukhatvaṃ na duḥkhatvaṃ na viśeṣo 'pi kaścana // MAnuv_4,2.36 //
GSP33madhanuu:3599: sthitayā dhvastayā caiva saṃsṛtirmokṣa ityapi // MAnuv_4,2.39 //
GSP33madhanuu:3607: nirviśeṣatvavācaiva śūnyaṃ brahmaiva no bhidā // MAnuv_4,2.43 //
GSP33madhanuu:3612: prāmāṇyādi ca vedasya phalataḥ samameva hi /
GSP33madhanuu:3622: na hi satpratiyogitvaṃ śūnyatvaṃ tena ceṣyate /
GSP33madhanuu:3625: dharmaste 'pi na santyeva ko viśeṣastatastayoḥ // MAnuv_4,2.51 //
GSP33madhanuu:3630: kalpitatvād viśeṣāṇāṃ māyino 'pi samaṃ hi tat // MAnuv_4,2.53 //
GSP33madhanuu:3634: yathetyukte vadet kiṃ sa yo 'numāmātramānakaḥ // MAnuv_4,2.55 //
GSP33madhanuu:3635: na ca māyī vadet tatra pūrvoktenaiva vartmanā /
GSP33madhanuu:3638: mokṣe bhogaṃ yato brūte jakṣan krīḍanniti śrutiḥ // MAnuv_4,2.57 //
GSP33madhanuu:3640: anumādūṣaṇaṃ kiṃ syād vādinoḥ śūnyamāyinoḥ // MAnuv_4,2.58 //
GSP33madhanuu:3643: heyaṃ māyāmatenaiva saha śūnyamataṃ budhaiḥ // MAnuv_4,2.59 //
GSP33madhanuu:3649: yadi kālo 'pi netyāha kadeti praśna uttaram /
GSP33madhanuu:3650: kiṃ vakṣyati yadāvasthāṃ vadet sā pakṣatāṃ vrajet // MAnuv_4,2.62 //
GSP33madhanuu:3651: avasthātvāditi hyeva hetuḥ sāpi kadeti ca /
GSP33madhanuu:3652: pṛṣṭe kālaśca vaktavyo nākālatvaṃ tato bhavet // MAnuv_4,2.63 //
GSP33madhanuu:3654: niruṇaddhi vaktavyo nākālatvaṃ tato bhavet // MAnuv_4,2.64 //
GSP33madhanuu:3660: nirākṛtāni teṣāṃ ca samatvāt pakṣadoṣayoḥ // MAnuv_4,2.67 //
GSP33madhanuu:3670: mahānandaṃ ca bhogaṃ ca niyamena vadanti hi // MAnuv_4,2.72 //
GSP33madhanuu:3673: nāsti hyaprākṛtaṃ duḥkhaṃ sato jīvasya kutracit /
GSP33madhanuu:3676: na samastapriyābhāvo mokṣe prokte tu yujyate // MAnuv_4,2.75 //
GSP33madhanuu:3679: ityātmapriyahānāya ko yateta ca buddhimān // MAnuv_4,2.76 //
GSP33madhanuu:3683: bhavānityuktavatyā hi nāhaṃ mohaṃ vadāmi te /
GSP33madhanuu:3689: ācikṣepa mataṃ tacca yasmin na viṣayādanam /
GSP33madhanuu:3692: kena taṃ ca vijānīyādityaniṣṭaṃ hi sarvathā // MAnuv_4,2.81 //
GSP33madhanuu:3696: na svavijñānitāyāṃ ca virodhaḥ kaścaneyate // MAnuv_4,2.83 //
GSP33madhanuu:3698: kathameva padaṃ gacched virodho dṛṣṭabādhanam // MAnuv_4,2.84 //
GSP33madhanuu:3704: śabdatattva iti proktaṃ maitreyyuktottaraṃ ca kim // MAnuv_4,2.87 //
GSP33madhanuu:3709: yatate sukhahānau hi ko mokṣāya yatet pumān // MAnuv_4,2.89 //
GSP33madhanuu:3712: na ca rāganimittaṃ tad vītarāgā api sphuṭam /
GSP33madhanuu:3717: iti skāndavacastasmāt sukhābhāvasya ko yatet // MAnuv_4,2.92 //
GSP33madhanuu:3719: pratipanno yathetyeva cānumā kena vāryate // MAnuv_4,2.93 //
GSP33madhanuu:3721: muktau na grāhyamevaitat sukhābhāvamataṃ budhaiḥ // MAnuv_4,2.94 //
GSP33madhanuu:3723: nirguṇe brahmaṇi mayi dhārayan viśadaṃ manaḥ /
GSP33madhanuu:3725: na viṣṇusadṛśaṃ daivaṃ na mokṣasadṛśaṃ sukham /
GSP33madhanuu:3726: na vedasadṛśaṃ vākyaṃ na varṇo 'kārasammitaḥ // MAnuv_4,2.96 //
GSP33madhanuu:3728: kāmasya yatrāptāḥ kāmāstatra māmamṛtaṃ kṛdhi // MAnuv_4,2.97 //
GSP33madhanuu:3730: ato mokṣe sukhābhāva iti yatkiñcideva hi // MAnuv_4,2.98 //
GSP33madhanuu:3732: śrutayaśca purāṇāni mānamatra bahūni ca // MAnuv_4,2.99 //
GSP33madhanuu:3733: na vartate yatra rajastamastayoḥ sattvaṃ ca miśraṃ na ca kālavikramaḥ /
GSP33madhanuu:3734: na yatra māyā kimutāpare hareranuvratā yatra surāsurārcitāḥ // MAnuv_4,2.100 //
GSP33madhanuu:3740: śrīryatra rūpiṇyurugāyapādayoḥ karoti mānaṃ bahudhā vibhūtibhiḥ // MAnuv_4,2.103 //
GSP33madhanuu:3741: ṛcāṃ tvaḥ poṣamāste pupuṣvān gāyatraṃ tvo gāyati śakvarīṣu /
GSP33madhanuu:3742: brahmā tvo vadati jātavidyāṃ yajñasya mātraṃ vimibhīta u tvaḥ // MAnuv_4,2.104 //
GSP33madhanuu:3744: dehaḥ svarūpātmaka eva teṣāṃ muktiṃ gatānāmapi ceyate hi // MAnuv_4,2.105 //
GSP33madhanuu:3745: śiraḥkarādyairapi muktibhājo yuktā yataste puruṣā idānīm /
GSP33madhanuu:3747: na brahmarūpatvamamuṣya dehino muktāvapi syāt pramayā kathañcit /
GSP33madhanuu:3748: sa brahmaṇā sahito 'śeṣabhogān bhuṅkte tathopetya sukhārṇavaṃ tam // MAnuv_4,2.107 //
GSP33madhanuu:3749: yattat paraṃ jyotirupetya jīvo nijasvarapūtvamavāpya kāmān /
GSP33madhanuu:3750: bhuṅkte sa daivaṃ puruṣottamo 'ja ātmeti cokto guṇapūrtihetoḥ // MAnuv_4,2.108 //
GSP33madhanuu:3752: ityādivākyairbhagavadvaśaḥ san bhuṅkte'khilān muktigato 'pi bhogān // MAnuv_4,2.109 //
GSP33madhanuu:3753: kālo 'pyasau naikyayutaḥ pareṇa jīvasya kālo yata eṣa yadvat /
GSP33madhanuu:3754: ityādikā apyanumāḥ pramāṇaṃ muktau ca jīvasya paratvarodhe // MAnuv_4,2.110 //
GSP33madhanuu:3755: kathaṃ ca yaḥ pūrvamasau na paścād bhavet sa evetyapi yuktimeti /
GSP33madhanuu:3756: yato na dṛṣṭaṃ yadabhūnna pūrvaṃ paścāt tadāseti kutaśca kiñcit // MAnuv_4,2.111 //
GSP33madhanuu:3757: nacaiva muktau tu hareḥ pṛthaktavamaikyaṃ tathā syāditi yuktimeti /
GSP33madhanuu:3758: yato na kutrāpi bhidābhidā ca dṛṣṭā citaścetanayā kutaścit // MAnuv_4,2.112 //
GSP33madhanuu:3759: itthaṃ matāni bhramajāni yasmānmokṣaṃ samuddeśyamapi bhrameṇa /
GSP33madhanuu:3760: vidurna samyag yadapīha laukikāḥ sukhaṃ mama syācca sadeti jānate // MAnuv_4,2.113 //
GSP33madhanuu:3766: nānāpravṛttiḥ kṛtakṛtyatā ca vipakṣatarkāḥ samatītapāde // MAnuv_4,2.116 //
GSP33madhanuu:3768: viśeṣakāryaṃ kṛtisaṃsthitiśca suyuktayo nirṇayagāḥ svapakṣe // MAnuv_4,2.117 //
GSP33madhanuu:3770: samānadharmaḥ kṛtaśeṣatā ca lokopamā pūrvamatānusārāḥ // MAnuv_4,2.118 //
GSP33madhanuu:3774: yasmācchrutau pavate ceti bhūri prokto yato bhūtamānī ca so 'pi /
GSP33madhanuu:3775: mahāmānī tvalpamānī ca yasmāt tacchabdenāpyucyate tena so 'pi // MAnuv_4,2.120 //
GSP33madhanuu:3776: tasmin layaṃ yānti bhūtānyaśeṣakramāvirodhena sa eva viṣṇau /
GSP33madhanuu:3777: indrādīnāṃ tatra layaḥ kramaṃ tu proktaṃ viśeṣādanusṛtya nānyat // MAnuv_4,2.121 //
GSP33madhanuu:3778: tasmādaśeṣā girijāṃ praviśya tayaiva rudraṃ saha tena vāṇīm /
GSP33madhanuu:3779: tayā patiṃ prāpya sahaiva tena layaṃ harau yānti samastajīvāḥ // MAnuv_4,2.122 //
GSP33madhanuu:3780: somastu vārīśayuto 'niruddhaṃ viśatyasau kāmamasau ca vāruṇīm /
GSP33madhanuu:3781: sā śeṣadevaṃ sa giraṃ ca saiva vāyuṃ viśatyañja itīha nirṇayaḥ // MAnuv_4,2.123 //
GSP33madhanuu:3782: umāgirīśāvapi bhāratīrāviti sma vāg vedagatā bravīti /
GSP33madhanuu:3783: ahīndrapatnīmahipaṃ viriñcapatnīṃ viriñcaṃ ca vimuktikāle // MAnuv_4,2.124 //
GSP33madhanuu:3784: ta eva yat tatpadamāpnuvanti tatkāla etān samupāsya jīvāḥ /
GSP33madhanuu:3785: brahmatvakāle praviśanti caitānīti sma vāk tādṛśatāmupaiti // MAnuv_4,2.125 //
GSP33madhanuu:3786: sūryo 'gniyukto gurumāpya tena śakraṃ sahainena suparṇapatnīm /
GSP33madhanuu:3787: tayā suparṇaṃ saha tena vāṇīṃ brahmāṇametadgata eva yāti // MAnuv_4,2.126 //
GSP33madhanuu:3789: uktā suparṇaśca girīśanāmnā tato virodhaśca na kaścanātra // MAnuv_4,2.127 //
GSP33madhanuu:3791: viśanti ye manavo rājamukhyā manuṃ praviśyātra gatā mahendram // MAnuv_4,2.128 //
GSP33madhanuu:3792: ākāśa urvī ca guruṃ praviśya tenaiva yātaḥ puruhūtadevam /
GSP33madhanuu:3793: sanādayo yatayaḥ kāmameva viśanti śiṣṭā api havyavāham // MAnuv_4,2.129 //
GSP33madhanuu:3794: varṇāśramācāraratā manuṣyā dharmaṃ manuṃ so 'pi sameti kāle /
GSP33madhanuu:3795: tameva sarve pitaraḥ surānugāḥ sarve kuberaṃ sa ca somameva // MAnuv_4,2.130 //
GSP33madhanuu:3798: krīḍanti bhūyaśca samāviśanti tāneva sāyujyamidaṃ vadanti // MAnuv_4,2.131 //
GSP33madhanuu:3799: sāyujyahīnāśca laye tu sarve proktena mārgeṇa viśanti sṛṣṭau /
GSP33madhanuu:3800: bahiśca niryānti tato 'nyadāpi sāyujyabhājāṃ bhavati praveśaḥ // MAnuv_4,2.132 //
GSP33madhanuu:3801: uktaṃ samastaṃ paramaśrutau hi proktaṃ tu sargakramato viparyayaḥ /
GSP33madhanuu:3802: muktau laye yadvadatho layaśca viparyayeṇetyavadad girāṃ patiḥ // MAnuv_4,2.133 //
GSP33madhanuu:3803: layo yato muktiriyaṃ surāṇāṃ bhogo viśeṣeṇa ca yaṃ vadiṣyati /
GSP33madhanuu:3805: bimbe layo yanniyataśca muktau cidātmanāṃ tadvaśatā ca sarvadā /
GSP33madhanuu:3806: tejo 'bhidhāṃ tu śriyamāpya viṣṇumagre tataḥ putratayaiva vāyuḥ /
GSP33madhanuu:3807: āptaḥ prasūtaḥ punareva viṣṇuṃ praviśya muktaḥ praḷaye 'tra tiṣṭhati // MAnuv_4,2.135 //
GSP33madhanuu:3809: bhuñjanta evāsata īśadehe laye 'tha sarge bahireva yānti // MAnuv_4,2.136 //
GSP33madhanuu:3810: prayāti dharmaṃ nirṛtistu śakraṃ marudgaṇāḥ pārṣadāstathaiva /
GSP33madhanuu:3814: sāntānikaṃ prāptirabhīṣyatā ca saukayarmityanyamatasya tarkāḥ // MAnuv_4,3.1 //
GSP33madhanuu:3816: siddhāntanirṇītikarāḥ pratīkaṃ dehādikaṃ tadgatameva ye narāḥ // MAnuv_4,3.2 //
GSP33madhanuu:3818: prāpsyantyato 'nye 'pi tamāpya tasmāddhariṃ gatā muktibhājaḥ parānte // MAnuv_4,3.3 //
GSP33madhanuu:3821: samastakāryaṃ vaśitā ca viśvasambhāvanā yuktayastvanyapakṣe // MAnuv_4,4.1 //
GSP33madhanuu:3825: patiṃ yadeṣāmapi viṣṇumāha hyutāmṛtatvasya patitvavāgdhareḥ // MAnuv_4,4.3 //
GSP33madhanuu:3827: prasiddhibhājastviti cānumaiva hyabhīṣyasiddhayai bhavatīha niścayāt // MAnuv_4,4.4 //
GSP33madhanuu:3829: anena devena tathāmunā ca hīṣye parārvāktanalokināmiti // MAnuv_4,4.5 //
GSP33madhanuu:3832: sarve baliṃ devagaṇā vahantītyetacca nānyasya hi yuktimeti // MAnuv_4,4.6 //
GSP33madhanuu:3833: lokā itīhāpi tu lokināṃ vaco lokā iti hyeva ravaḥ prajāsu /
GSP33madhanuu:3834: prayujyate sarvajanaiḥ sadaiva tanmānino lokapadena coktāḥ /
GSP33madhanuu:3835: tadgāstu muktā iha lokaśabdā anyonyanāthā iti paiṅgināṃ śrutiḥ // MAnuv_4,4.7 //
GSP33madhanuu:3836: alokaśabdena vimuktibhājo vācyāḥ padaṃ tādṛgapīha yuktam /
GSP33madhanuu:3837: lokābhidhāścāpi yato hi muktāḥ prakāśarūpāḥ satataṃ ca sarve /
GSP33madhanuu:3838: brahmaiva lokādhipatirvimukto bhavediti prāha turaśrutiśca // MAnuv_4,4.8 //
GSP33madhanuu:3839: naceha vijñānaphalaṃ samuktaṃ lokādhipatyaṃ ravibimbato harau /
GSP33madhanuu:3840: uktaṃ pṛthak tacca puraiva yasmād bhedo 'munetyādi ca samyaguktaḥ // MAnuv_4,4.9 //
GSP33madhanuu:3841: tvapratyayaṃ cāpyatihāya naiva rūpeṇa teneti bhavedihārthaḥ /
GSP33madhanuu:3842: bhavatyasāvityaṇuśabdamatra vihāya vākyāni bahūni doṣaḥ // MAnuv_4,4.10 //
GSP33madhanuu:3843: ato jagadvayāpṛtimanta eva brahmādayaḥ pūrṇaguṇāḥ krameṇa /
GSP33madhanuu:3847: yasya trīṇyuditāni vedavacane rūpāṇi divyānalaṃ baṭ tad darśatamitthameva nihitaṃ devasya bhargo mahat /
GSP33madhanuu:3848: vāyo rāmavaconayaṃ prathamakaṃ pṛkṣo dvitīyaṃ vapurmadhvo yattu tṛtīyametadanumā granthaḥ kṛtaḥ keśave // MAnuv_4,4.13 //
GSP33madhanuu:3850: bhūtisvayambhuśarvādivandyaṃ tvāṃ naumi me priyam // MAnuv_4,4.14 //
